alert.note: Alert for Northern Arctic Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued January 06 at 1:35PM AKST until January 08 at 3:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM SUNDAY TO 3 AM AKST MONDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Northern Arctic Coast. * WHEN...From 3 AM Sunday to 3 AM AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult. Large drifts will form. The cold wind chills as low as 30 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel extremely difficult. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
